com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.snapshotter

Class MapSnapshotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.snapshotter.MapSnapshotter

  • @UiThread
public class MapSnapshotter
extends java.lang.Object
    The map snapshotter creates a large of the map, rendered off the UI thread. The snapshotter itself must be used on the UI thread (for access to the main looper)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  MapSnapshotter.ErrorHandler
      Can be used to get notified of errors in snapshot generation
      static interface  MapSnapshotter.Observer
      Can be used to get notified on snapshotter style loading completion.
      static class  MapSnapshotter.Options
      MapSnapshotter options
      static interface  MapSnapshotter.SnapshotReadyCallback
      Get notified on snapshot completion.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapSnapshotter(android.content.Context context, MapSnapshotter.Options options)
      Creates the Map snapshotter, but doesn't start rendering or loading yet.

      • MapSnapshotter

        public MapSnapshotter(@NonNull
                      android.content.Context context,
                      @NonNull
                      MapSnapshotter.Options options)
        Creates the Map snapshotter, but doesn't start rendering or loading yet.
        Parameters:
        context - the Context that is or contains the Application context
        options - the options to use for the snapshot

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(@NonNull
                  MapSnapshotter.SnapshotReadyCallback callback)
        Starts loading and rendering the snapshot. The callback will be fired on the calling thread.
        Parameters:
        callback - the callback to use when the snapshot is ready

      • start

        public void start(@NonNull
                  MapSnapshotter.SnapshotReadyCallback callback,
                  MapSnapshotter.ErrorHandler errorHandler)
        Starts loading and rendering the snapshot. The callbacks will be fired on the calling thread.
        Parameters:
        callback - the callback to use when the snapshot is ready
        errorHandler - the error handler to use on snapshot errors

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the image

      • onSnapshotReady

        protected void onSnapshotReady(@NonNull
                               MapSnapshot snapshot)
        Called by JNI peer when snapshot is ready. Always called on the origin (main) thread.
        Parameters:
        snapshot - the generated snapshot
